questions.question: What is V.E.R.A?
questions.answer: V.E.R.A stands for Virtual Entity for Responsive Assistant. It's a tool designed to help blind people by providing responsive assistance.

questions.question: How does V.E.R.A work?
questions.answer: V.E.R.A uses advanced AI technology to interpret visual information and convert it into audio descriptions, helping blind users navigate their environment and understand their surroundings.

questions.question: Do I need an internet connection to use V.E.R.A?
questions.answer: For now, V.E.R.A requires an internet connection to work.

questions.question: How can I set up V.E.R.A?
questions.answer: Setting up V.E.R.A is simple. Just plug in the adapter, connect the microphone, and activate it by saying 'Hello V.E.R.A'.

troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting
troubleshooting.description: Find solutions to common issues with V.E.R.A

solutions: Check if the device is properly connected and powered on

Check if the correct language setting is selected
